title: Combine mounted weed seed reduction system
summary: A combine mounted weed seed reduction system which processes weed seeds in the chaff to make them unviable

eligible.eligibleBullet01: be a combine mounted weed seed reduction system
eligible.eligibleBullet03: process weed seeds in the chaff to make them unviable
eligible.eligibleBullet04: use milling, grinding, smashing or cracking of the weed seeds to make them unviable
eligible.eligibleBullet05: able to be retrofitted to combines
